thread.title: Gisele Bundchen took an epic celebration selfie
thread.title_full: Gisele Bundchen took an epic celebration selfie

author: USA TODAY
title: Gisele Bundchen took an epic celebration selfie
text:
Gisele Bundchen took an epic celebration selfie Tom Brady's wife was PUMPED. Post to Facebook Gisele Bundchen took an epic celebration selfie Tom Brady's wife was PUMPED.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/super-bowl-51-new-england-patriots-atlanta-falcons-tom-brady-gisele-bundchen-celebration-selfie-video/   Gisele Bundchen took an epic celebration selfie Charles Curtis , USA TODAY 11:06 p.m. ET Feb. 5, 2017 
Gisele Bundchen celebrates Tom Brady's comeback win in the Super Bowl. (Photo: screen grab) 
Gisele Bundchen - who came to Super Bowl 51 with her family dressed in great uniforms to cheer on husband Tom Brady - went absolutely crazy after the New England Patriots completed an absolutely stunning comeback in overtime. 
And like anybody who would celebrate such an incredible moment, she had her phone in her hand to capture it: — Kyle Porter (@KylePorterCBS) February 6, 2017 
Then, briefly, she fumbled it: Gisele celebrates by spiking her phone. #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/ttMMA81HfX — the makers market (@MMinTuscaloosa) February 6, 2017 
She might be a little busy at the moment, but hopefully she'll post it on social media. That's going to make for one amazing video.
